about_the_game: An elaborate Chinese chess game that offers amateur, professional and master fields with three games from low to high levels. Whether you're a chess amateur or a professional chess player, you'll find your opponents here to fight hundreds of rounds. In addition to the actual combat, the game also provides more than 100 popular folk classic chess scores for you to learn and study, you can automatically play on the board (non-video) or manually watch each step of the chess score. Finally, the game also offers hundreds of chess scraps from simple to complex to wait for you to crack. Believe that through the training of this game, your chess level will be rapid progress! The game uses a points system, and automatically counts the player's game data, including the number of general administration, win-loss number and win-win ratio. Player points can be redeemed for rich gifts in future gameplays.
